resources.string: Here we can appreciate the main park and the puddles of the Tapartó corregimeinto
Here we can appreciate one of the most emblematic hotels in the municipality known as: Finca Hotel Los Arrayanes.
Two of the most typical dishes of the region, the Paisa tray and the Antioqueña mazamorra.
Two of the most important sources of the economy of the region; coffee and livestock.

My name is Dylan Díaz Castañeda, I am 26 years old, currently I am a Labor Technical Student as a Software Development Assistant with basic knowledge of English. I am a well-mannered, disciplined, respectful person with skills for communication, dialogue and teamwork.
